title: FlexPay versus Vindicia: Best Failed Payment Recovery Solution
summary: This page compares FlexPay's AI-driven failed payment recovery solution with Vindicia, highlighting FlexPay's early intervention strategy and superior recovery rates. It details FlexPay's advanced AI technology, extensive transaction data for ML training, and diverse recovery methods compared to Vindicia's more static approach.
key_points: FlexPay uses AI for early intervention in failed payments, while Vindicia focuses on late-stage recovery.
FlexPay claims an average of 136% increase in recovery compared to other solutions.
FlexPay leverages 25+ ML models trained on over 11 billion transactions.
FlexPay utilizes a combination of AI, data enhancements, account updater, and customer outreach for recovery.
